cz.ive.genius
Class BasicGenius

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.genius.BasicGenius
All Implemented Interfaces:
Genius, Updateable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AreaGeniusImpl
public class BasicGenius
extends java.lang.Object
implements Genius, java.io.Serializable

Basic implementation of a genius. This is just a simple genius as it is driven only by the affordances. The main idea behind this implementation is: All changes in the triggers/contexts/process states are transfered to the diry mark on an appropriate rule level. Then when all other changes to the world are evaluated, genius simply goes through the dirty rules and makes changes to the processes (stops the old, runs the new and so on).

Author:
ondra
See Also:

Method Detail

ruleChanged

public void ruleChanged(RuleTreeNode rule)
Value of the g_trigger/g_context/p_context/process state have changed. We must reevaluate all siblings. So mark the parent as a dirty rule.

Parameters:
rule - Rule node which was changed

ruleLost

public void ruleLost(RuleTreeNode rule)
The given rule and whole its subtree do not exist any more, no need to reevaluate it.

Parameters:
rule - RuleTreeNode to be unmarked.

expandProcess

public void expandProcess(RuleTreeNode rule)
The environment will not execute this process as atomic. We must get the process expansion and create approprite rules from it.

markDirty

protected void markDirty(RuleTreeNode rule)
Marks the given rule node as dirty for later reevaluating. This method also registers the RoundHook if there was no dirty rule present.

Parameters:
rule - RuleTreeNode to be marked as dirty.

ruleJudgement

protected boolean ruleJudgement(RuleTreeNode shouldRun,
                                RuleTreeNode running,
                                RuleTreeNode stopping)
Do the final rule judgement.

Parameters:
shouldRun - Rule which g_trigger is firing (and its priotity is the bigest).
running - Rule that is currently runnning
stopping - Rule that is currently stopping
Returns:
true if no problem has occured, false if the parent process should fail.

runProcess

Choses one of the processes implementing the goal associated with the given rule.

Parameters:
rule - Rule which process should be executed.
Returns:
true iff the process was successfully chosen and executed, false otherwise.

deactivate

public void deactivate()
All goals and processes are deactivated. All hooks and all connection to the world is disposed. Also all passive queries should be unregistered here.

Specified by:
deactivate in interface Genius
